product_name: Von Zipper Skylab Snow Goggles - Quasar Chrome - Men's
long_description: If you like knowing what's going on around you when skiing, the dual-spherical polycarbonate lens of the Skylab goggles provides an unobstructed peripheral view of others around you on the slope.
short_description: If you like knowing what's going on around you when skiing, the dual-spherical polycarbonate lens of the Skylab goggles provides an unobstructed peripheral view of others around you on the slope.
